original: Arbman, Jonas Sigfrid, fd. läroverksadjunkt, Karlshamn, f. 11/1/79 i Döderhult, Kalmar 1., av kontr :prost J. A. o. Maria Kristina Pettersson. G. 17 m. Gunborg Hanse. Barn: Per- Gunnar f. 19, Ehsabeth 22. — Stud:ex. i Växjö 99, teoL fil. ex. i Upps. 01, teol. kand. o. prakt. teol. prov 04, fil. kand. 07, provår i Upps. 08. Part. vik. adj. i Upps. 08, vik. adj. i Hudiksvall 09-11, lär. där v. Rodenstamska sk. sem:kurs f. utb. av lär :or i husl. ekon. m. m. 09-11, adj. i kristend. o. mo-dersm. v. realsk. i Karlshamn 11, tim-lär. v. komm. gymn. i Karlshamn 19- 31, rektors skrivbitr. 21-32. Led. av kyrkoråd sed. 16, kyrkovärd sed. 25, led. av kyrkofullm. 32, v. ordf. s. å., led. av bibl:styr. 17-21, led. av flick-sk rstyr. sed. 27, ordf. sed. 28, led. av stadsfullm. sed. 31, ordf. i folkpart, lokalavd., av koll. vald led. av lokalstyr. 28-29, tryckfrihetsomb. sed. 39. RVO 35.
translated: Arbman, Jonas Sigfrid, former high school teacher, from Karlshamn, born on January 11th, 1879 in Döderhult, Kalmar county, son of district priest J. A. and Maria Kristina Pettersson. Married to Gunborg Hanse. Children: Per-Gunnar born in 1919, Ehsabeth born in 1922. He passed the student examination in Växjö in 1899, Master of Arts in theology in Uppsala in 1901, theological candidate with practical theological examination in 1904, Bachelor of Arts in 1907 and probationary year in Uppsala in 1908. He was a substitute teacher in Uppsala in 1908, a substitute teacher in Hudiksvall from 1909 to 1911, a teacher at the Rodenstamska school in Hudiksvall from 1909 to 1911, a teacher of Christianity and mother tongue at the real school in Karlshamn in 1911, a part-time teacher at the municipal gymnasium in Karlshamn from 1919 to 1931, and a writing assistant to the principal from 1921 to 1932. He was a member of the church council since 1916, church ward since 1925, member of the church board since 1932, vice chairman in the same year, member of the library board from 1917 to 1921, member of the girls' school board since 1927, chairman since 1928, member of the city council since 1931, chairman of the local branch of the people's party, elected member of the local board from 1928 to 1929, and press freedom commissioner since 1939. He was awarded RVO in 1935.

education.name: Master of Arts in theology in Uppsala
Theological candidate with practical theological examination
